title: Create A/B Test for an Email Campaign
description: A marketing manager wants to test two different subject lines for an upcoming promotional email to see which one gets a higher open rate.

tasks.description: Set up a new email campaign in the marketing platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager begins creating the new campaign.

tasks.description: Select the 'A/B Test' option and enter two different subject lines (Version A and Version B).
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager configures the A/B test with the two variations.

tasks.description: Launch the campaign. The system will send Version A to a small portion of the audience and Version B to another small portion. After a set time, it will automatically send the winning version to the rest of the audience.
tasks.expected_outcome: An A/B test is executed to optimize the campaign's performance.
